property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card can be packed as if it was a 2D maneuver. This card is +#D, where # is equal to twice the number of Action cards in your opponent's Ring. When he has 5 or more Actions in his Ring, this card can only be reversed from Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are not Michael Tarver, can be reversed as if it was non-Unique. Put 1 card from the bottom of your Arsenal into your hand. When you are Michael Tarver, you may search for this card as if it were non-Unique and when this card is successfully played, your opponent discards 1 random Backlash card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if it was non-Unique. All players discard 1 random card; when you have Classic Competitor in your Backstage Area or you are Tajiri, discard 1 card instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if it was non-Unique. When played, discard up to 5 cards, this card is -1F and +1D for each card discarded.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if it was non-Unique. The Fortitude of this card cannot be increased or decreased.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if it was non-Unique. All players draw 1 card.

card.name: Classic Toss Out of the Ring

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if it was non-Unique. Draw 1 card. Your next card played this turn is considered to be played after Throw Opponent Out of the Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if it was non-Unique. When played after a maneuver with 'classic' in the title, this card is -4F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if it was non-Unique. When successfully played, you may reduce the damage of this move to 0. If you do, search your Arsenal for From the Top Rope or From the Middle Turnbuckle, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle; when that card is the next card played this turn, your opponent cannot respond to it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if it was non-Unique. When played after Irish Whip or Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle, this card is Multi.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if it was non-Unique. Your opponent discards 1 card and removes the top card of his Arsenal from the game. You cannot play Maintain Hold after this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if it was non-Unique. When you are Rowdy Roddy Piper, The Rowdy One, or Brutus 'The Barber' Beefcake, this card is -2F and +1 Stun Value.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if it was non-Unique. Can only be played after a successfully played 2D+ maneuver. Shuffle up to 2 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be reversed as if it was non-Unique. Can only be played after a successfully played 2D+ maneuver. When played after From The Top Rope, can only be reversed from hand or Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you are Carlito or Daniel Bryan, or when High-Flying Style is in your Ring. When played from hand, reverse any non-Unique maneuver and your opponent puts the reversed maneuver in his hand. When this card is in your Ring, your Hurricanrana cards are +1 Stun Value, and can only be reversed from hand and Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Allegiance: WCW. When played, you may ignore a 'can only be reversed' or 'cannot be reversed' effect from a card. Reverse any non-Superstar-specific card that 'cannot be reversed' or with a 'can only be reversed' effect. Draw up to 1 card, and put up to 1 card under Halloween Havoc and up to 1 of your cards removed from the game under Where the Big Boys Play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Allegiance: None. Cannot be packed by Rick Rude. When played from hand, reverse any non-unique maneuver; when played by Batista, draw 1 card. When this card is in your Ring, discard 1 less card to Activate your Allegiance card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Allegiance: WWF. Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver or as a Counter (1D+ reversal to a maneuver). Can only be reversed by Unique reversals. When the next card played this turn is a maneuver with 'Classic' in the title, ignore the 'Can only be played...' text, it is +5D and can only be reversed from Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is considered non-Unique for your opponent's reversals. When this card is reversed, draw up to 2 cards. During his next turn, his non-F: 0 cards are +10F. Ignore the 'before the Draw Segment of the first turn of the game' text on your Overrated Superstar.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Allegiance: ECW. When this card is in your hand, you successfully played a maneuver of 9D+ and it is not reversed, you may put this card into your Ring, shuffle up to 3 cards removed from the game into your Arsenal, reveal The House That Hardcore Built, and then search your Arsenal for 1 maneuver, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle. When you are a printed Extremist, double all non-Damage numbers on this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, cannot be reversed when you have lower Fortitude; shuffle up to 2 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal. As a reversal, ignore any reversal restriction from a card, reverse any non-Unique maneuver that is Revolution or has a reversal restriction from your opponent; when overturned, can also reverse any non-damage card effect (even during the Pre-match phase), and put this card in to your Ring. Choose one: draw 1 card or he discards 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Allegiance: WWE. As an action, cannot be reversed when you have lower Fortitude; shuffle up to 4 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal and draw 1 card. As a reversal, reverse any ECW, nWo, or WCW card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by an NXT Superstar. When you are Justin Gabriel or Michael Tarver, this card is F: 0. As an action, shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal. As a reversal, reverse any Strike, Grapple, or Submission and draw up to 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Legend. When you are not packing The New Legends of the WWE, can only be played when you have lower Fortitude. When you are packing Classic Competitor, this card is -5F. Reverse any non-maneuver card and shuffle up to 2 cards in your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, Arsenal, Ringside, and Removed From Game Search 1 Trademark Finisher; reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle. When your next card played this turn is a Trademark Finisher, it is F: 0 and ignore the 'Can only be played...' text, and when you have lower Fortitude it now reads 'Can only be reversed from Arsenal.' until the end of the turn. As a reversal, this card is F: 0, when overturned and you have 15- cards in your Arsenal, completely reverse any card or card effect and put this card in your Ring (regardless of other effects); you may play this card as your first card on your next turn as if from hand and your opponent cannot respond to it.

card.name: No Class, No Taste, No Shirt, $#!t Faced!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Allegiance: Raw. When your next card played this turn is The Sex, the Gods, the Freaks, the Frauds., your opponent cannot respond to it.

card.name: All I've Got Left is My Pride

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Allegiance: Smackdown and either lower Fortitude or fewer cards in hand. Search your Arsenal for an F: 0 maneuver with blank text, put it in your Ring, and shuffle. You may remove any number of Pre-match cards in your Ring from the game, and then draw up to 1 card for each card moved from your Ring (up to 2 cards when the card moved is Smackdown).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by The Godfather or The Home Team. Overturn up to 3 cards and shuffle up to double that number of cards from your Ringside to your Arsenal. ACE: When your opponent successfully plays a non-Superstar-Specific card that allows him to search any Arsenal, you may put this card on top of your Arsenal and shuffle 2 cards from hand into your Arsenal and then he does not search and his turn ends.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by The Godfather. Discard any number of cards, and your opponent overturns the same number of cards. Reveal the top card of your Arsenal and if it is a maneuver, he overturns 2 cards; if it is an Action, you discard 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Allegiance: Smackdown and All I've Got Left is My Pride in your Ring. Put up to 1 Smackdown maneuver from your Ringside into your hand. When your next card played this turn is Break It Out, Break You Down, Breakin' Rules, Breakin' Ground, it cannot be reversed.

card.name: No Fear, No Doubt, All In, Balls Out!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Allegiance: Raw. Discard cards from your hand until you have 2 cards in hand. Look at your opponent's Backlash, choose 1 non-superstar-specific card, and he discards the chosen card. When your next card played this turn is a 9D- Trademark Finisher, he cannot respond to it; when it is a 10D+ Trademark Finisher and it is not reversed, you win the game via Pinfall Victory.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Allegiance: McMahonism. Your opponent cannot respond to this card. When playing this card and Divine Intervention is in your hand, you may remove it from the game; if you do, this card is -20F. Draw 12 cards, then put 8 cards from hand and up to 8 cards from Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Ric Flair or by a Stable. At the start of each player's turn before their Draw Segment, when they have more than 7 cards in their hand, they shuffle 1 random card from hand into their Arsenal; when they have more than 14 cards in their hand, they shuffle 1 random additional card; and when they have less than 7 cards in their hand, they may draw 1 card. Before any players' Draw Segment, when both players have 7 cards in hand, put this card from your Ring into your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by an NXT Superstar. Cannot be blanked. This card and Underrated Superstar do not take up a Pre-match slot in your Ring. When you draw for your Ability, draw 1 additional card, and when you move cards into your Arsenal for your Ability, move 1 additional card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played by a WCW Superstar. This card does not take up a Pre-match slot in your Ring. Your opponent draws 3 cards, and then you put the top card of your Arsenal face-down as a non-Unique D: 3 Strike played from hand, and he may attempt to reverse it as if it was your turn; if he does not, put the card under this card. He discards 2 cards. When there is a card under this card and you have no Pre-match cards of D:1+ in your Ring, your Fortitude Rating is +3F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Cannot be packed when packing cards with 'blood' or 'interest' in the title. At the end of the Pre-match phase, put up to 1 card from hand under this card (up to 2 cards when It's Hard Being This Original is in your Ring), and up to 1 card from Ringside for each copy of Old School Psychology in your opponent's Ring under this card, when you are CM Punk, draw up to 1 card. During your turn, you may play cards under this card as if from hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent's effects cannot prevent you from playing this card. Can be played from Ringside. Any player's First of All and Hell in a Cell Match are blank until the start of their first turn. When Redemption is in your Ring, it is blank. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you may either overturn 4 cards or remove 1 Pre-match card in your Ring from the game, and then you are not affected by his Hell In A Cell Match, There Is No Escape, or First of All until the start of your next turn, and he is considered to have not played a Volley card on his last turn. This effect cannot be reversed.

card.name: Survey Time! Who's Here to See The n...W...o...?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Allegiance: nWo. Cannot be blanked. When packed by Hall and Nash or Scott Hall, this card is Superstar-specific. At the end of the Pre-match phase, draw up to 1 card, put up to 1 card from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal, your opponent discards 1 card, and overturns 1 card. When you are Scott Hall, double those numbers. ACE: During your turn, you may remove this card from the game and shuffle up to # +2 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal, where # is the number of nWo cards in your Ring and Backstage Area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Allegiance: WCW. When you are a WCW Superstar, this card does not take up a Pre-match slot in your Ring, and when you Activate Where the Big Boys Play, you may put the cards on the bottom of your Arsenal instead. When Houston, Texas is not in your Ring, you and your opponent draw 4 cards, and he randomly discards cards until he discards a hybrid card; then, you discard the same number of cards. When Flanked by Arena Security is not in any player's Ring, all players' Starting Hand Size are -2, and all players draw 3 less cards for The Best Laid Plans.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Universally Unique, Fan Favorite, WWF Classic, ACE

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Legend or WWF Superstar. When this card is put into your Ring, you may put 1 card from hand under this card. Cards under this card may be played as if from hand. ACE: When your opponent plays a maneuver, you may put this card into your Ringside and then your reversal played to it is -5F and deals no damage. When this card is in your Ringside, you may overturn 3 cards, put it in your Ring, and end your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Pre-match Capacity is +1. Reveal up to 3 different Stipulations (except Hell in a Cell Match) from your Backlash, immediately play 1 of them face-up on top of this card and put the rest under this card. The card on top of this card is considered to be in your Ring. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you may discard 1 card and then put any Stipulation on top of this card under this card and put 1 random Stipulation from under this card on top of this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by 1-2-3 Kid, Christy, Eve, Kane, Paul Burchill, Sandman or The Second Coming. When this card is in your Ring and you are not Muhammad Hassan or The Iron Sheik, before each of your Draw Segments, your opponent may overturn 1 card and flip 2 cards in his Ring face-down; if he does, you overturn 2 cards. ACE: Once during any players' turn, he may move this card from any Ring to any other Ring, and then discard 1 card and 1 Backlash card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When packing this card, your Sit Right Here and Bide My Time and Break It Out, Break You Down, Breakin' Rules, Breakin' Ground are Unique. Can be played regardless of The Boogeyman's Ability. Your Sit Right Here And Bide My Time does not take up a Pre-match slot in your Ring and cannot be blanked; your non-unique Smackdown cards are -3F. ACE: Once during each of your turns when your opponent reverses your card, you may discard 3 cards and overturn 3 cards and then continue your turn; your next card played this turn can only be a Smackdown card and you may ignore the 'Can only be played...' text on it; after damage is applied from that card, end your turn.

card.name: We Burn It to the Ground Tonight

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed when packing more than 1 copy of The King Interferes! or From the Mind of Eric Bischoff. Can be played regardless of The Boogeyman's Ability. Ignore the 'You cannot play Pre-match cards' text on your Raw Pre-match cards, and your first non-Unique Raw Action of each turn cannot be reversed by hybrid or Unique reversals. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you may put 2 Raw cards in your Ring under this card, and then your opponent overturns 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Shelton Benjamin, Test, or New Nexus. Can only be played with a non-Superstar-specific printed F: 0 Chain maneuver. When played, choose Grapple or Submission; this card is considered to be only the chosen type for the rest of the turn. Your opponent cannot play Over Sell Maneuver in response; unless both maneuvers are reversed when played, both are successfully played.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is packed as either a Pre-match or a Mid-match. Cannot be packed by The Home Team or Rey Mysterio. Can only be played when Back To Basics is in your Ring. As an event, this card is -9F, at the end of the Pre-match phase, put any number of non-unique cards with 'old school' in the title (that do not have 'psychology' in the title) from your Backlash into your Ring. As a reversal, reverse any non-Superstar-specific Throwback; your opponent may overturn 4 cards, if he does not, remove the reversed card from the game. When this card is in your Ring, your Activated Card Effects on your non-unique cards with 'old school' in the title cannot be reversed, and double all numbers on your Old School Beating.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be reversed by 2 reversal cards. Search your opponent's hand, Backlash, Arsenal, Ring and Ringside for 1 Trademark Finisher, reveal it, add that card's Damage, Stun Value and text to this card, ignoring any reversal restrictions, until the end of the turn; he shuffles his Arsenal. This card is -5D and -1 Stun Value until the end of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by 1-2-3 Kid, Eve, Sandman, or The Second Coming. As an action, when you have lower Fortitude, your opponent cannot respond to this card; reveal the top 3 cards of your Arsenal, you may put any D: 3- cards into your Ring face-down, and shuffle. As a reversal, this card is F: 0, and when you have lower Fortitude, reverse any card that is not the first or second card played this turn. When this card is in your Ring, once during each of your turns, you may choose 1 face-down card in your Ring that does not have 'win the game' in the text, and turn it over.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by The Home Team or The Heat Seekers. During your turn when you are a Stable and have not played or Activated any cards this turn, you may put this card from your Backlash into your Ring. When the next card you play this turn is a Trademark Finisher, you may play up to 1 additional Trademark Finisher from hand, Backlash, or Ringside (as if from hand or Backlash) with it, and you may ignore the 'Can only be played...' text on 1 of those cards. Unless both maneuvers are reversed when played, both are considered successfully played; after damage is resolved, your turn ends.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Paul Heyman. Cannot be reversed when you have a card with 'Heyman' in the title in your Ring. Search your Arsenal and Ringside for Paul Heyman's Shoot Promo, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle; that card is -4F and cannot be reversed. When your opponent has at least 15 greater Fortitude and he successfully plays a maneuver, you may ignore the 'during your turn' text on your Managed by Paul Heyman and immediately Activate it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Allegiance: Faction. When you do not have a Revolution card in your Ring, this card is -6F and when it is unsuccessful, put it in your Backlash instead. Search your Arsenal for 1 card with your Faction in the text, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Doink or when packing Back to Basics. Arsenal/Ringside Search 10 non-Trademark-Finisher ’Dynamic’ maneuvers and put them under this card; if you do not, hide this card. At the end of the Pre-match Phase, put 1 card under this card in your hand, and shuffle the other cards into your Arsenal. Your Pre-match Capacity is +1 for each The Luck of The Draw card in your Ring greater than 1. Your non-Unique ’Dynamic’ maneuvers are -3F and +2D. When you have lower Fortitude, your opponent is considered to have double the number of reversals in his Ring for your effects with ‘dynamic’ in the title or text.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Replace 'non-Enforcer, non-Superstar cards' with 'non-Superstar-specific Backstage cards without 'Shenanigans' in the title' on all Backstage Shenanigans cards. When your opponent Activates The Intensity of Ten Cities, you may overturn 1 card and remove that card from the game instead. When you would discard your hand or Backlash to his effects, you may instead discard # random cards, where # is half the number of cards to be discarded (rounded down).

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent's Break It Out, Break You Down, Breakin' Rules, Breakin' Ground is Active, and his Old School Psychology is Active unless Back To Basics is in his Ring. When you would discard for WWE Women's Championship Belt, you may overturn 2 cards instead. When he is Eugene, his Ability cannot be blanked or switched, he cannot play Superstar-specific 4D+ reversals, his maneuvers with Momentum do not have it, and he cannot play or use effects from Virtual Superstar-specific cards without his logo, or There Is No Escape.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is always considered to be revealed. Can only be packed by a Rookie, The Nexus or New Nexus. Cannot be packed when packing Allegiances or a Pro. Your opponent cannot play Backstage Shenanigans. Your cards with 'interfere' in the title are -3F and he discards 1 card when they are successfully played.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by an NXT Superstar. This card is considered Superstar-specific. Do not discard for Armageddon Is Upon Us. Once during each of your turns, you may overturn 4 cards and then draw 1 card; when you have lower Fortitude, overturn 2 less cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Rookie. During your turn, you may hide this card and draw 3 cards, and all players discard 1 card; when you are Michael Tarver, you may also put 1 D:0 card in your opponent's Ring into his Ringside.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Rookie. When you are Wade Barrett, at the end of the Pre-match phase you may look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 non-Superstar-specific card, he shuffles it into his Arsenal and draws 1 card. During his turn when he has successfully played more than 1 non-maneuver card, you may hide this card and then end his turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Rookie. During any turn when your opponent draws more than 1 card (other than his Draw Segment), you may hide this card and he does not draw those cards; when you have lower Fortitude, you draw that number of cards. When you are Heath Slater, you may hide this card to reverse a non-Superstar-specific non-maneuver card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Rookie. When you are Darren Young, your Starting Hand Size is +1 and when revealed your opponent discards 1 Backlash card. During your turn, you may hide this card and name a reversal card, and he cannot play the named card to your next card played this turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Rookie. During your opponent's turn, when you have 10- cards in Arsenal, you may put this card from your Backstage into your Ring to completely reverse any non-Trademark Finisher maneuver; when you are not Titus O'Neil, discard cards until you have no more than 3 cards in hand. Cannot be moved from your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Rookie. During your turn when you successfully play a Grapple or High Risk maneuver, you may hide this card and shuffle 4 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal; when the maneuver was a non-Multi High Risk, shuffle 2 additional cards. When you are Justin Gabriel, you may shuffle in 2 additional cards and draw 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Rookie. During your turn, you may hide this card and when your next card played this turn is maneuver, it is considered Unique; when you are David Otunga, you may also put up to 2 cards from your Ringside under The 'It' Factor.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Rookie. When you successfully play a non-reversal card, you may hide this card and then search your opponent's Arsenal for a card with the same title, he removes it from the game and shuffles. When you would discard cards for his effects, you may instead hide this card and overturn the same number of cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Rookie. When you are Skip Sheffield, your Starting Hand Size is +1, and double the numbers in this card. During your turn, you may hide this card and choose one: search your Arsenal for 1 non-Unique Action, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle; or when your next card played this turn is a Strike or Assault, your opponent must discard 1 card and overturn 2 cards to play a reversal to it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Before each of your Draw Segments, hide 1 other Superstar card and choose 1 Superstar Card to reveal. Revealed Superstar Cards add their Ability to this Ability. When your opponent successfully plays a Superstar-specific 8D+ maneuver, or an 8D+ reversal, remove 1 other hidden Superstar Card from the game. You may pack Wade Barrett, Justin Gabriel, David Otunga, Skip Sheffield, Heath Slater, Michael Tarver, and Darren Young in your Backstage Area and they are hidden. You may not pack Corners, Managers, Guest Ringside Announcers, or Face cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may put Handicap Match from your Backlash into your Ring. During your turn, you may hide this card and then search your Arsenal for a The Nexus-specific card, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. During each of your turns when you have not played any cards this turn, and it is not the first turn of the game, when you play a non-Multi printed F: 0 Strike from hand, you may also play another non-Multi printed F: 0 Strike from hand with it; unless both cards are reversed when played, both are successfully played. Unless both cards are reversed, your turn continues.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card requires 3 reversals to reverse instead of 2. When you have less than 14 cards in your Arsenal, this card is -25F. Put all cards in all players' Rings into their Ringside.

card.name: You're Either Nexus or You're Against Us

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be packed when packing The Nexus Armband. When you are The Nexus, this card is F: 0. Reverse any non-Unique maneuver, any Run-in, or any Activated Card Effect from a Manager or Guest Ringside Announcer card. Your opponent discards 1 card and overturns 2 cards; when you are The Nexus, double those numbers.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, when you have at least 3 cards in your Arsenal, you may overturn 3 cards and your opponent discards 3 cards; when your turn ends, he draws 1 card. You may pack CM Punk Arsenal cards, but you may not pack Thrust Knee Lift or Set-up cards. Your Chain cards are not Chain.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed when packing I'm Gonna Break You. Remove any number of Backlash cards from the game. If you removed at least 3 cards from the game, you may increase your Starting Hand Size by +4. If you removed at least 6 cards, you start the game. If you removed at least 9 cards, his effects that would make you discard cards are reduced to 1. If you removed at least 12 cards, he cannot respond to your first printed F:0 D:6- maneuver played of the game, and after its damage is applied, end your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Can be played regardless of your opponent's effects. ACE: When he plays a maneuver, you may reveal an applicable reversal from hand or Backlash with printed Fortitude up to your Fortitude Rating; if you do, put it under this card and his maneuver is successfully played. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you may put a card under this card into your Ringside, and then when your next card played this turn is a non-Unique maneuver, it can only be reversed from Arsenal; this effect cannot be reversed by non-Superstar-specific cards. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you may reveal 1 Superstar-specific card in your hand, and then put it on the bottom of your Arsenal and draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent cannot respond to this card, and it cannot be blanked. When you are New Nexus, this card is F: 0; when you are not, remove Rookie cards in your Backstage Area from the game until there are 3 or less. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you may remove 3 random cards in your Ringside from the game and put 1 non-reversal card removed from the game into your hand or Backlash.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver or a superstar-specific card. Cannot be reversed from Backlash. Discard 1 card, and your opponent discards 1 random card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. When played, you may reveal up to 2 Trademark Finishers from hand, and then put the revealed cards on the bottom of your Arsenal. If you revealed 1 Trademark Finisher, this card cannot be reversed from Backlash; if you revealed 2, it also cannot be reversed from hand by non-Superstar-specific cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, cannot be reversed from Backlash when played after a successfully played card. As a reversal, reverse any Superstar-specific maneuver and discard 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-Unique card, search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique maneuver, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle. Your opponent overturns 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, reveal cards from the top of your Arsenal until you have revealed 4 maneuver cards; put them into your Backstage Area and shuffle. Once during each of your turns, you may reveal 1 maneuver from hand, shuffle it into your Arsenal, and then put 1 maneuver from your Backstage Area into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Search your Arsenal for 4 The Corre-specific cards with different additional logos; reveal them, put them under this card, and shuffle. During your turn, you may put all cards under this card in your hand. ACE: During your turn when there are no cards under this card, you may put this card into your Ringside, shuffle 4 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal, and draw 4 cards.

card.name: I'll Be Your End of Days

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, your opponent cannot respond to this card. As a reversal, this card is -4F. When you have fewer reversals in Ring, your maneuvers are -#F, where # is the number of reversals in his Ring more than you have in your Ring. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you may remove 1 non-Backlash reversal in your Ring from the game and then put up to 4 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal. When this effect is reversed, put 1 card from your Ringside into your hand.

card.name: The More You Try to Silence Me...

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is -#F, where # is the number of reversals in your opponent's Ring and cannot be less than 4; when it is reversed, put it in your hand instead. He may remove # random cards in his Ringside from the game. If he does, draw 4 cards and put 4 cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal. If he does not, put 4 cards from Ringside and/or removed from the game in your hand and when the next card you play is a The Corre-specific maneuver, it is -4F, +4D, and he cannot respond to it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have fewer reversals in Ring, this card is -12F. Reverse any maneuver, and put up to 2 maneuvers in your Ringside into your Backstage area.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Strikes without 'kick' in the title that are not hybrid, Multi, or Foreign Objects are -3F and Chain.

card.name: From NXT Winner to Nexus Leader

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When From NXT to WWE is in your Ring and your opponent causes you to discard cards, he discards 1 card. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you may flip 2 other cards in your Ring face-down and then your opponent puts 1 random card from his hand on the bottom of his Arsenal. During your turn when this card is in your Ringside, you may discard 3 cards to put it into your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-Superstar-specific maneuver, or when you are Wade Barrett, this card is -5F and reverse any maneuver instead. Your opponent puts 1 card from hand on the bottom of his Arsenal and you draw 1 card; when you are Wade Barrett, flip up to 2 cards in your Ring without 'win the game' in the text face-up.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are The Corre, this card is Multi. ACE: When you are Wade Barrett and this card is in your Ring, you may put it on the bottom of your Arsenal to reverse a non-Superstar-Specific non-maneuver card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is -20F, shuffle this card and any number of cards in your hand into your Arsenal and draw the same number cards; your opponent shuffles # cards from hand into his Arsenal and draws # -1 cards, where # is the number of cards you drew.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have either 7 or more cards with The Nexus logo, or both the cards titled From NXT Winner to Nexus Leader and Barrett's Big Boot in your Ring, this card cannot be reversed from hand or Backlash. You may discard up to 5 cards, and your opponent overturns the same number of cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Before your Draw Segment when this card is in your hand, you may put it in your Ring and draw 1 card. When you unsuccessfully play a maneuver, put up to 1 other maneuver from your Ringside into your hand and end your turn. When you successfully play a maneuver and this card is in your Ring or Ringside, you may put it into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw 2 additional cards during each of your Draw Segments, and at the end of your turn, put 2 cards from hand on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is revealed or in your Ring, and you overturn cards for The NXT Breakout Star, you may put 1 of those cards under The 'It' Factor instead. When you would discard cards or put cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal, you may put this card from your Backstage Area into your Ring instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked, and cannot be moved from your Ring when there are no cards under this card. Once during each of your turns, you may put 1 card from hand under this card. When you must discard any number of cards, you may move cards from under this card to your Ringside instead. When this card is moved from your Ring, put all cards under it into your hand, and shuffle up to the same number of cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, this card is F: 0 and your opponent cannot respond to it when you have lower Fortitude; when your next card played this turn is a maneuver, you may put cards equal to the Damage of that maneuver from under The 'It' Factor into your Ringside; if you do, your opponent cannot respond to that maneuver. As a reversal, reverse a non-Unique maneuver and draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played as a maneuver, you may put 2 cards from hand on the bottom of your Arsenal and choose one: this card cannot be reversed from hand or Backlash. When played after a successfully played card, you may choose to put 2 additional cards from hand on the bottom of your Arsenal and choose both options.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 1 non-Backlash card from your Ringside and up to 1 card from your hand under The 'It' Factor. When this card is reversed, put it in your hand instead and put the bottom card of your Arsenal under The 'It' Factor. When this card is in your Ring, you may play cards from under The 'It' Factor as if from hand; when that card is not in your Ring, your opponent plays with his hand revealed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your '#D' text on your High Risk maneuvers is now '0D', and when you successfully play a High Risk, shuffle up to 1 card removed from the game into your Arsenal. You may pack High-Flying Style.

card.name: Touch of Darkness, Flight of Angels

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns when you successfully play a non-High-Risk 3D+ maneuver, you may overturn 2 cards and then reduce the Damage to 0; if you do, the card is considered to be resolved, and your opponent may not play reversals to it.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns when you successfully play a 3D+ maneuver, you may search your Arsenal for 1 High Risk maneuver, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle; when your next card played this turn is a High Risk you may ignore the 'Can only be played after...' text, and your opponent may ignore its 'Can only be reversed...' text. ACE: Once during each of your turns, you may reveal 1 High Risk from your hand, put it on the bottom of your Arsenal and then shuffle 1 non-unique non-reversal card from your Ring into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -6F, can only be played after a successfully played card and can only be reversed by Unique cards. As a reversal, reverse any non-Superstar-specific non-maneuver card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 8D+ maneuver. Search your opponent's Arsenal, choose 1 card, remove it from the game, and they shuffle; when you are Justin Gabriel, choose 1 additional card. During your turn when this card is in your hand, you may reveal it, draw 1 card, and shuffle this card into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any Unique maneuver, your opponent overturns 3 cards, and your first maneuver played on your next turn is -5F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your first non-Multi action played from hand each turn cannot be reversed by hybrid or BASH reversals, and your antics are -3F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After all Pre-matches are resolved, look at the top 5 cards of your Arsenal, put 1 of those cards in your hand, and put the rest on the top and/or bottom of your Arsenal in any order. When you successfully play an antic or a non-multi action, and your next card played this turn is a non-Superstar-specific maneuver, it can only be reversed by D:0 reversals from hand and Arsenal.

card.name: I'm About to Blow Your Mind

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you have lower Fortitude and your opponent's Fortitude Rating is 10 or more, this card is F: 0 and cannot be reversed by non-hybrid reversals or non-reversal cards. Draw up to 3 cards and shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal. When your next card played this turn is a maneuver, it can only be reversed from Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played card; when played, ignore 'non-Superstar-specific' on The One-Man Rock Band.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played maneuver; when you are Heath Slater, can only be played after a successfully played card. As an action, this card is -5F, put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal and put 1 card from your Ringside into your hand. As a reversal, reverse any Strike or Action.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played as a maneuver, ignore 'non-Superstar-specific' on The One-Man Rock Band. As a reversal, reverse any Grapple or non-maneuver card. When successfully played, your opponent discards 1 card and 1 random card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you successfully play a maneuver, discard 1 card and then your opponent randomly discards 1 Backlash card; when his discarded card is a Pre-match card, he overturns 3 cards; when it is a reversal, shuffle up to 3 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal; otherwise, draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your opponent's next Pre-match card played does not have 'taunt' in the title, he must discard 2 Pre-match cards to play it. Before the Draw Segment of your first turn of the game, search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique card, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your Fortitude Rating is 5 or less and your maneuver is unsuccessfully played, you may put this card from your Backlash into your opponent's Ring. When this card is in your Ring, you cannot play reversals from hand unless you discard 1 Backlash reversal card; when you are Darren Young, discard any Backlash card instead. When this card is in your Ring and your opponent reverses a card from hand, put this card into his Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw up to 2 cards. When this card is discarded for your Ability, shuffle it into your Arsenal instead; when it is overturned, put it in your hand instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-Unique maneuver or when overturned, remove this card from the game to reverse any maneuver or non-damage card effect (even during the Pre-match phase). When this card is overturned for The NXT Breakout Star, you may remove it from the game. When this card is removed from the game, shuffle up to 3 cards (up to 6 if it was overturned for The NXT Breakout Star) from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played card. When played, discard up to 5 cards from your hand, and your opponent discards the same number of cards from his hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during each of your turns, you may remove 1 card in your Ring from the game, and then search the top 5 cards of your Arsenal for 1 maneuver, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. When this card is moved from your Ring, put up to 1 card from Ringside into your hand. When you would overturn cards for The NXT Breakout Star, overturn half as many cards instead, rounded up. When this card is in your Ring or Ringside, your non-Revolution cards with 'lariat' in the title cannot be reversed by Unique cards, and your opponent cannot play non-Unique reversals with 'completely' in the text from hand or use reversal effects with 'completely' in the text to your Lariat Takedown cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are Skip Sheffield, this card is -10F and can only be reversed by Unique reversals. When played as a maneuver, this card is -5F and +5D.

property.value: When played after a successfully played card with 'lariat' in the title, this card is -5F and cannot be reversed by non-Unique cards from Backlash.

property.value: When you are Skip Sheffield, this card is +10F and +10D. As a reversal, reverse any non-maneuver card and shuffle up to 2 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal. When this card is overturned, you may put this card into your Ring. When this card is in your Ring, do not discard Backlash cards from successfully played maneuvers.

card.name: Yep Yep Yep! What It Do

property.value: When you are Michael Tarver, your Starting Hand Size is +3. property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card would be discarded or removed from the game, put it in your Backlash instead. Draw 1 card, shuffle up to 9 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal, and your opponent overturns cards equal to the number of cards with 'punch' in the title in your Ring.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played, this card is -15F, and when your opponent's Fortitude Rating is 20 or more, this card is a Trademark Finisher instead of a Strike. When this card is overturned for The NXT Breakout Star, put it on the bottom of your Arsenal instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, cannot be reversed by non-Unique cards when you have lower Fortitude. As a reversal, reverse any Strike or Grapple. Your opponent discards cards equal to the number of cards in your Ring with 'punch' in the title.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you would randomly discard cards or randomly remove cards from the game, you may choose the same number of cards from the same area instead. You may not pack Man of 1,000 Holds.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Pre-match Capacity is +3. Your opponent cannot play 'Your Town'. During your turn, you may hide this card and your next maneuver played this turn is -8F. When you have lower Fortitude, you may hide this card to reverse a non-Unique maneuver and draw up to 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Search your Arsenal for 2 non-Superstar-specific Unique cards, reveal them, put them under this card, and shuffle. When one of your maneuvers is unsuccessfully played, you may put Opulence from your Backlash or Ringside into your Ring.

property.name: Card Text

card.name: My Name... My Name is Alberto Del Rio!

property.value: Can only be played as your first card of your first turn, and your opponent cannot respond to it. Shuffle any number of cards from your hand into your Arsenal and draw the same number of cards +1. During your turn, you may discard this card from Backlash to draw 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring, your Ring Psychology: Arm is blank and when you play a maneuver, choose 1 maneuver in your opponent's Ring; when that maneuver can be flipped, he may flip that maneuver face-down, and if he does not, your played maneuver has the text of the chosen card instead until it is resolved. ACE: When you have lower Fortitude, you may put this card into your Backlash and when your next card played this turn is a non-Unique maneuver, he cannot play non-Unique reversals to it. This effect cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played after a successfully played maneuver with 'arm' in the title, this card is Multi. Your opponent discards 1 random card. property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -10F and can only be reversed by Unique reversals. As a reversal, reverse any Activated Card Effect or non-maneuver card. When successfully played, your opponent discards 2 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent discards his Backlash. When your next card played this turn is Maintain Hold, ignore the 'Can only be played...' text and it cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you have lower Fortitude. When this card is in your hand, Ringside, or Ring you may reveal it, put it on the bottom of your Arsenal, remove 1 random card in your Ringside from the game, and shuffle 1 card in your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.value: Draw 1 card for every 2 Alberto Del Rio-Specific cards in your Ring. Look at your opponent's Backlash, choose 1 card, and he discards the chosen card.

property.name: Card Text

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you successfully play a maneuver and you have 3 or more non-Revolution maneuver types in your Ring, you may reveal this card, draw 3 cards and your opponent overturns 3 cards. property.name: Card Text

property.name: Card Text

When you would play a printed F: 0 Submission for Panic Grab, you may play a non-unique printed F: 0 maneuver from your hand instead, but you cannot put I Have 'til FIVE! into your Ring this turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your Submission, Hold, or card with 'maintain' in the title or text is reversed, and you have not played a card with 'panic' in the title this turn, put this card from your Backlash into your Ring and overturn 5 cards; the maneuver is successful, it is not reversed, and your opponent's non-F: 0 reversals to that card are +5F; after damage is applied, end your turn. When your maneuver has 'apply' in the title, put up to 5 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played card; when played after a 5D+ maneuver, cannot be reversed from hand or Backlash by non-Unique cards. When unsuccesfully played, overturn 5 cards. As a reversal, when played from hand, reverse any non-maneuver card when it is not your opponent's first card played this turn. When successfully played, he discards 1 random card.

property.name: Card Text

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played after a successfully played maneuver, cannot be reversed by non-Superstar-specific reversals from hand or Backlash. When this card is in your hand and you overturn cards, you may discard this card and 1 other card instead of overturning.

property.name: Card Text

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once during any player's turn, when you discard any number of cards for your opponent's effects, you may then draw 1 card. property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is +2D for each Pump Kick in your Ring. As a reversal, reverse any Strike or Grapple. When successfully played, shuffle up to 4 cards in your Ringside and/or removed from the game into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played after a Strike or Assault, cannot be reversed from Backlash. When played after a Grapple or Throw, cannot be reversed from hand. When played after a card that was played from your Backstage Area, cannot be reversed from Ring or Ringside.

property.value: Completely reverse any card, even if it cannot be reversed. When this card reverses, even from Arsenal, put this card into your Backstage and put up to 2 of your cards removed from the game into your Ringside.

property.name: Card Text

property.name: Card Text
